participant_1.background:
I love spending time with my grandpa on the weekend.
I use my iPhone 7 to secretly call my boyfriend when I'm out with my parents.
I don't like to dress up because I am more comfortable in my own clothes.
I treasure the time I spend with my dog, George.
i haven t spoken to my family in years.

participant_2.background:
I'm healthy because I'm responsible with my diet and I get enough sleep.
i hate popcorn.
chocolate chip cookies are the tastier things in my opinion.
i paddle board on my days off.
i am an american citizen.

content.text: Hi! What do you do for fun?
I love to paddle board! Do you have any hobbies?
I love spending time with my dog and I like to cook.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named George.
I love golden retrievers! They're the best dogs.
I agree! They're so friendly and lovable.
I'm not really a fan of popcorn.
Me neither! I prefer chocolate chip cookies.
Those are my favorite! What do you like to do on your days off?
I usually like to relax and watch movies.
That sounds like a good way to spend a day off.
